story_05_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
What a great battle! I’m so glad I had the chance
to battle you!
story_05_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
My Pokémon and I are super satisfied we were
able to really spread our wings!
story_05_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Not to mention, I could tell that you were enjoying
battling alongside your Pokémon and friends.
story_05_05000/2401_0301_0400_10: Good match! That was really fun!
story_05_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Oh, that’s right! This belongs to you now.
You’ve earned it!
story_05_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You did it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
We’ve got our second badge!
story_05_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
You know what? I decided.
I’m going to join your team!
story_05_05000/2401_0401_1200_10:
If I go along with you guys, I think we’ll be
able to have tons of fun adventures!
story_05_05000/2401_0402_1400_10:
If I go along with you guys, I think we’ll be
able to have tons of fun adventures!
story_05_05000/2401_1001_1500_10:
All right, then! Make sure your seat belt is secure,
your seat is upright, and your tray table is stowed.
We’re taking off to the next badge!
